text: Then Martha, when she heard that Jesus was coming,Since Jesus stopped outside the village (verse 30), I wonder how Martha got the word. Perhaps Jesus sent one of the disciples, but there may well have been a lookout watching the road. went to meet Him; but Mary remained sitting at home.Mary was quite possibly unhappy with Jesus. It was obvious that He had not come when called, or He would have arrived several days sooner. She would conclude that He just didn't care that much. Since Jesus acted deliberately, it is clear that the Plan involved making the sisters go through that emotional suffering. We need to fix firmly in our minds that belonging to Jesus does not mean a free rideâ€”we too may suffer precisely because of the outworking of God's Plan. After all the discussion is over, we have two options: rebel or submit.
